description: 💫👨‍💻Modular Telegram bot for managing your groups with a few extras features.💫 by t.me/mr_purushottam_m

ALLOW_EXCL.description: 💫Set this to True if you want ! to be a command prefix along with /💫

TL_APP_ID.description: 💫Get this value from my.telegram.org! Please do not steal💫

TL_HASH.description: 💫Get this value from my.telegram.org! Please do not steal💫.

BAN_STICKER.description: 💫ID of the sticker you want to use when banning people.💫

MESSAGE_DUMP.description: 💫optional: a chat where your replied saved messages are stored, to stop people deleting their old💫

DEL_CMDS.description: 💫Set this to True if you want to delete command messages from users who don't have the perms to run that command.💫

GBAN_LOGS.description: 💫Gban log channel, include the hyphen too: ex: -123456💫

ENV.description: 💫Setting this to ANYTHING will enable environment variables💫.

KICK_STICKER.description: 💫ID of the sticker you want to use when kicking people.💫

SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI.description: 💫Your postgres sql db, empty this field if you dont have one.💫

DEV_USERS.description: 💫ID of users who are Dev (can use /py etc.)💫

STRICT_GBAN.description: 💫 Enforce gbans across new groups as well as old groups. When a gbanned user talks, he will be banned.💫

STRICT_GMUTE.description: 💫 Enforce gmute across new groups as well as old groups. When a gmutes user talks, he will be muted💫

SUDO_USERS.description: 💫 A space separated list of user IDs who you want to assign as sudo users.💫

SUPPORT_USERS.description: 💫 A space separated list of user IDs who you wanna assign as support users(gban perms only).💫

WEBHOOK.description: 💫Setting this to ANYTHING will enable webhooks.💫

WHITELIST_USERS.description: 💫A space separated list of user IDs who you want to assign as whitelisted - can't be banned with your bot.💫

name: 𓊈𒆜PRINCESS𒆜𓊉
